subject: SSN5992
description_text:
Hello, i ordered the Plus X Pedals on the 11th Jan. with Express Shipping (#
SSN5992)
but it seems that my package does a roadtrip through whole china^^ its not
a problem but can u tell me round about when its gonna be delivered? Its a
bit annoying that i paid for express and its not gonna be fulfilled, but
its okay i just wanna know when my package will be delivered round about.

Best regards and thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi Florian Rößler,  ​It is found that your order is in transit and is expected to arrive around the 22nd. Please keep an eye out for it.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238967291

That's great, thank you very much.

On Tue 20. Jan 2026 at 9:25 AM, service@simsonn.com

Hi Florian Rößler,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.Wish you a pleasant day.
